website_summaries.verdict: This shampoo is good for boosting the fullness of long hair.
pros: Leaves hair feeling thicker and easier to style
Best results come as a  combination of use with the conditioner
cons: While those who like this product give it good reviews, some people found it did little to thicken their hair

customer_reviews.title: It’s just OK
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but I couldn’t tell a difference from other thickening products I’ve used. It’s a brand I trust, so I will continue to use until I sample, or hear about, a product that works better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Wood

customer_reviews.title: Think this really works!
customer_reviews.text: It may be my imagination, but my hair does seem to feel heavier, while still very soft. Love the fragrance of this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: SLW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo--I've used it for years and haven't found anything better.
customer_reviews.author: Kat H

customer_reviews.title: It does what I need.
customer_reviews.text: As I grow older I find less strength in my hands and this small item helps me to feel that I have washed my hair better than w/o it. Anne Barron
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely improves the texture of fine limp hair! I see a difference I the size of my long braid. Havebeenusingthis andth conditionertoo for about two years!
customer_reviews.author: leeward

customer_reviews.title: Convient
customer_reviews.text: I ordered from amazon because Ulta website wants a lot of information filled out before ordering. I just wanted my product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo!!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo leaves my hair super soft and thick feeling!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love the lift
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this lifts my hair without making it frizzy
customer_reviews.author: Carey Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great for Fine Hair
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and love that I can order from Amazon so I'm not having to locate a salon that carries it. I have fine hair and this protect really improves my hair's texture.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Rottman

customer_reviews.title: No seal
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with no safety seal or shrink wrap. I question if it's a genuine product
customer_reviews.author: dgrav

customer_reviews.title: ... connoisseur of thickening shampoos due to my thin / fine hair. Don't make the same mistake as me
customer_reviews.text: This is THE most expensive & THE most weakest formula thickening shampoo I have encountered and I am a connoisseur of thickening shampoos due to my thin / fine hair. Don't make the same mistake as me, and waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Liked it very much and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Rip off price.
customer_reviews.text: Sephora has 8 Oz bottle thickening shampoo for 25.00! Rip off!
customer_reviews.author: marie e

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I had heard about this shampoo for years and finally tried it. I have fine hair with no body. This shampoo made my hair even worse. I just don't get how it has such great reviews. And it is also not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy
